metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26564 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
HotelDruid Hotel Management Software v3.0.3 contains a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability via the prezzoperiodo4 parameter in creaprezzi.php.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26564` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

hoteldruid - 3.0.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.4-1').
